job_title: Full Stack .Net Development and L3 support experience
jd: From: Pradeep, Scalable Systems pradeep.sharma@scalable-systems.com Reply to: pradeep.sharma@scalable-systems.com Hi,Greetings of the day! I have an urgent requirement below, please go through JD and let me know if you are comfortable or have any profile. Kindly revert me back with your updated resume as well. Job Title: Full Stack .Net Development and L3 support experience Location: Plano, TX (Work from Office)Duration: Long Term Contract Responsibilities:Expertise as a Full Stack Developer with primary skills of SQL Server and Asp .Net.Complex SSIS Development capability with being able to write and understand complex SQL Server queries is must.PowerShell Scripting is an add-on as there are activities to replace the existing processes with PowerShell.Understating of the on-premises Infrastructure and AWS architecture and ability to work in Cloud migration projects from existing on Premise environments.Handling Python and .Net applications along with Web Hosting and providing L3 level support.Hands on experience in UNIX is also preferred.Knowledge of SSL/TLS certificates and renewal.Idea about load balancing and networking troubleshooting.Knowledge of Dynatrace or any monitoring tool.Knowledge of AutoSys or any scheduler configuration.Understating the Treasury and funding business. Thanks & Regards, Pradeep SharmaEmail: pradeep.sharma@scalable-systems.com "Scalable Systems is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, or any other legally protected status."
